MajorClaims.MC1: human needs should be considered more
MajorClaims.MC2: nowadays humans need farmland, housing and industry

Claims.C2: increasing population are more important than saving land for endangered animals
Claims.C3: they do not need so much land that people need
Claims.C4: farmlands are vital for human life
Claims.C5: they need land to build their houses on it
Claims.C6: some lands should be assigned to industry

Premises.P1: day by day population is increasing
Premises.P2: human needs for food is increasing as well
Premises.P3: the population of endangered animals are less than people's population
Premises.P4: We need farmland to grow crops such as wheat and corn, and there is no doubt that without food people cannot alive for more than some weeks
Premises.P5: people need shelters to protect themselves from mother nature such as wind and flood and wild animals
Premises.P6: Dwelling is one of the most important human needs after food which is undeniable
Premises.P7: human need some crucial things to continue their life, and most of them are industrial such as medicine
Premises.P8: Todays life has some difficulty which become comfortable with the help of industry
